extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Pebble communication message spooling facility.

      • offer

        public boolean offer(com.getpebble.android.kit.util.PebbleDictionary data)
        Add a message to be sent to Pebble. This method should be used for adding a new message to the queue. Call this whenever you need to send a message to the Pebble application. Note that the message is processed asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        data - message to send.
        Returns:
        true if successfully spooled.

        public void stop()
        Stop Pebble message spooler.
